message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.OH 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the challenges of developing and maintaining long tail scientific software, and proposes the idea of a non-profit center of excellence to make software engineering more accessible as a shared service. This topic is closely related to software engineering (cs.SE) and cyberinfrastructure (cs.CY), as well as issues of code reuse (cs.CR), programming languages (cs.PL), and open science (cs.OH).
